faqs.question: What are your shipping policies?
faqs.answer: Our shipping policies include free shipping on orders over Rs 500. Orders under Rs 500 have a flat shipping fee of Rs 100.

faqs.question: Do you offer free shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer free shipping on orders over Rs 500. For orders under Rs 500, there is a flat shipping fee of Rs 50.

faqs.question: What is the return policy?
faqs.answer: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase for a full refund. The item must be in its original condition and packaging.

faqs.question: How do I initiate a return?
faqs.answer: To initiate a return, please visit our returns page and fill out the return form. You will receive instructions on how to ship your item back to us.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover, and PayPal.

faqs.question: Can I pay with Online?
faqs.answer: Yes, we accept paytm, Gp, DebitCard , Credit Card as a payment method.

faqs.question: is COD  Available ?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can pay after delivery.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Shipping usually takes 3-5 business days for standard delivery and 1-2 business days for expedited delivery.

faqs.question: Can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can track your order using the tracking number provided in your shipping confirmation email.

faqs.question: What should I do if I receive a damaged item?
faqs.answer: If you receive a damaged item, please contact our customer service immediately. We will arrange for a replacement or refund.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Currently, we only ship within the India.

faqs.question: What are the customer service hours?
faqs.answer: Our customer service is available Monday through Friday from 9 AM to 5 PM .

faqs.question: Can I change my order after it has been placed?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, once an order has been placed, we cannot make changes to it. Please contact customer service for further assistance.
